inputs.task: Review and improve homepage copy for LaunchBase
inputs.description: AI-powered website operations system that handles website updates, social media, and business intelligence for small businesses. Core value: responsibility transfer (hand off operations, keep visibility). Not a website builder - a complete operations handoff with observability, reversibility, and safety gating.

currentCopy.hero: Stop carrying the system in your head. Hand it off. Keep visibility.
currentCopy.problem: No one owns the system. You're the fallback for everything.
currentCopy.solution: LaunchBase becomes the owner. You stay informed, not involved.
currentCopy.trust: Safe by default. Fully logged. Reversible.

inputs.audience: Small business owners (fitness studios, coffee shops, consulting firms, e-commerce) who are tired of being the bottleneck for their website and marketing operations
inputs.tone: Direct, honest, reassuring. B2B professional. Emphasize responsibility transfer and observability.
inputs.constraints: No hype language. No unverifiable claims. Focus on concrete benefits: mental load reduction, visibility, reversibility, safety gating.

proposedChanges.value: Stop being the system's bottleneck. Hand it off for better visibility.
proposedChanges.rationale: Clarifies the role of the user and emphasizes the benefit of visibility while maintaining directness.

proposedChanges.value: No clear ownership of your operations.
proposedChanges.rationale: More straightforward phrasing that directly addresses the core issue without ambiguity.

proposedChanges.value: With LaunchBase, you transfer ownership of operations while staying informed.
proposedChanges.rationale: Rephrasing maintains the core message while enhancing clarity about the ownership transfer.

proposedChanges.value: Designed with safety in mind. Fully reversible and logged for your peace of mind.
proposedChanges.rationale: Adds specificity to the trust message while reinforcing the safety aspect.

issues.description: Claims 'AI-powered website operations system' without explicit proof of AI capabilities in input
issues.rationale: Unverified claim - introduces AI capability not present in input

issues.description: Phrase 'responsibility transfer' is somewhat vague and not defined in input
issues.rationale: Ambiguity - term is not concrete or specific

suggestedFixes.fix: Website operations system that handles updates, social media, and business intelligence for small businesses.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Removes AI claim, maintains focus on the core value of operations management

suggestedFixes.fix: Core value: transfer of operational responsibilities while maintaining visibility.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clarifies the phrase 'responsibility transfer' to enhance specificity

risks: Removing AI claim may impact perceived innovation
assumptions: Audience understands the concept of operational responsibility transfer
